tagline: Coding worlds, one line at a time.
vision: To shape the future of interactive storytelling through innovative game design and immersive digital experiences.
purpose: Combine creativity and code to craft games that entertain, inspire, and connect players worldwide.

values.title: Creativity
values.description: Push boundaries to design unique, engaging experiences.

values.title: Precision
values.description: Write clean, efficient code that powers seamless gameplay.

values.title: Resilience
values.description: Learn, adapt, and grow from every challenge in development.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: Work with others to bring ambitious ideas to life.
